languages.text: "Ранее я сказала бы, что это скорее выдумка. Можно много говорить о недостойности {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллики{/g} и других темных заправил Футфола, но даже эти бандиты верны {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g} и безжалостно уничтожают открытых еретиков на своей территории. Но теперь..."

traits.locale_text: "Ранее я сказала бы, что это скорее выдумка. Можно много говорить о недостойности {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллики{/g} и других темных заправил Футфола, но даже эти бандиты верны {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g} и безжалостно уничтожают открытых еретиков на своей территории. Но теперь..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "There was a time when I'd have said it was likely a fabrication. One can say many things about the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} and the other shady operators on Footfall, but even those thugs are loyal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and so they mercilessly exterminate outright heretics in their territory. But now..."
languages.original_text: "Ранее я сказала бы, что это скорее выдумка. Можно много говорить о недостойности {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллики{/g} и других темных заправил Футфола, но даже эти бандиты верны {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g} и безжалостно уничтожают открытых еретиков на своей территории. Но теперь..."

traits.locale_text: "There was a time when I'd say that it's most likely a fable. One can say many things about the Kasballica Mission and other shady ringleaders of Footfall, but even those thugs are loyal to the Emperor, and so they mercilessly exterminate downright heretics in their territory. But now..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There was a time when I'd say that it's most likely a fable. But now..."

traits.locale_text: "There was a time when I'd have said it was likely a fabrication. One can say many things about the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} and the other shady operators on Footfall, but even those thugs are loyal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and so they mercilessly exterminate outright heretics in their territory. But now..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “如果换做是以前的我，我会说这可能仅仅是传言罢了。我会说，尽管{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}和落脚港那些形迹可疑的商人有很多可以指摘的地方，但即使是那群暴徒，也对{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}忠心耿耿，毫不留情地消灭了这颗行星上的异端分子。可现在……”
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I'd have said it was likely a fabrication. One can say many things about the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} and the other shady operators on Footfall, but even those thugs are loyal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and so they mercilessly exterminate outright heretics in their territory. But now..."

traits.locale_text: “如果换做是以前的我，我会说这可能仅仅是传言罢了。我会说，尽管{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪团伙{/g}和落脚港那些形迹可疑的商人有很多可以指摘的地方，但即使是那群暴徒，也对{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}忠心耿耿，毫不留情地消灭了这颗行星上的异端分子。可现在……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Hace no mucho, habría dicho que es una farsa. Se pueden decir muchas cosas de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}misión Kasballica{/g} y otras organizaciones turbias en Paso, pero incluso esos matones son fieles al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} y exterminan sin piedad a los herejes que encuentran en su territorio. Pero ahora...».
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I'd have said it was likely a fabrication. One can say many things about the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} and the other shady operators on Footfall, but even those thugs are loyal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and so they mercilessly exterminate outright heretics in their territory. But now..."

traits.locale_text: «Hace no mucho, habría dicho que es una farsa. Se pueden decir muchas cosas de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}misión Kasballica{/g} y otras organizaciones turbias en Paso, pero incluso esos matones son fieles al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} y exterminan sin piedad a los herejes que encuentran en su territorio. Pero ahora...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「きっと捏造だろう、と言っていた時期もありました。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}やフットフォールの他の怪しげな業者についていろいろ言うことはできますが、それらの悪党でさえ{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に忠誠を誓っている。だから、奴らは領土内の異端者は容赦なく駆逐しているのです。ですが今は…」
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I'd have said it was likely a fabrication. One can say many things about the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} and the other shady operators on Footfall, but even those thugs are loyal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and so they mercilessly exterminate outright heretics in their territory. But now..."

traits.locale_text: 「きっと捏造だろう、と言っていた時期もありました。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}やフットフォールの他の怪しげな業者についていろいろ言うことはできますが、それらの悪党でさえ{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に忠誠を誓っている。だから、奴らは領土内の異端者は容赦なく駆逐しているのです。ですが今は…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Es gab eine Zeit, da hätte ich gesagt, dass das alles wahrscheinlich eine Erfindung ist. Man kann der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica-Mission{/g} und den anderen zwielichtigen Gestalten auf Footfall viel vorwerfen, aber selbst die Verbrecher stehen dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} loyal gegenüber und löschen Ketzer auf ihrem Territorium gnadenlos aus. Aber jetzt ..."
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I'd have said it was likely a fabrication. One can say many things about the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} and the other shady operators on Footfall, but even those thugs are loyal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and so they mercilessly exterminate outright heretics in their territory. But now..."

traits.locale_text: "Es gab eine Zeit, da hätte ich gesagt, dass das alles wahrscheinlich eine Erfindung ist. Man kann der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica-Mission{/g} und den anderen zwielichtigen Gestalten auf Footfall viel vorwerfen, aber selbst die Verbrecher stehen dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} loyal gegenüber und löschen Ketzer auf ihrem Territorium gnadenlos aus. Aber jetzt ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « À une époque, j'aurais répondu que ces rumeurs sont probablement infondées. On peut reprocher beaucoup de choses à la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g} et aux autres figures véreuses de Castel, mais même ces malfrats sont loyaux à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} et exterminent sans pitié les hérétiques sur leur territoire. Maintenant, cependant... »
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I'd have said it was likely a fabrication. One can say many things about the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} and the other shady operators on Footfall, but even those thugs are loyal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and so they mercilessly exterminate outright heretics in their territory. But now..."

traits.locale_text: « À une époque, j'aurais répondu que ces rumeurs sont probablement infondées. On peut reprocher beaucoup de choses à la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g} et aux autres figures véreuses de Castel, mais même ces malfrats sont loyaux à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} et exterminent sans pitié les hérétiques sur leur territoire. Maintenant, cependant... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Doğrusu eskiden olsa uydurma derdim. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu{/g} ve Binliman'ı mesken tutan diğer şaibeli yapılanmalar hakkında çok şey söylenebilir ancak o eşkıyalar bile {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} sadıktır ve bölgelerine dadanan kâfirleri gözlerinin yaşına bakmadan yok ederler Şimdiyse..."
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I'd have said it was likely a fabrication. One can say many things about the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} and the other shady operators on Footfall, but even those thugs are loyal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and so they mercilessly exterminate outright heretics in their territory. But now..."

traits.locale_text: "Eskiden olsa uydurma derdim doğrusu. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu{/g} ve Binliman'ı mesken tutan diğer ne idiği belirsiz operatörler hakkında ne dersen de… Ancak o eşkıyaların dahi {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un sadık kulları olduğuna şüphe yoktu. Bölgelerindeki kâfirleri, gözlerini kırpmadan idam ederlerdi. Şimdiyse…"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
